Description: !!PASSIVE_AncientScholar_Awaken_DESC
When This Creature Dies. Grant 150% Life Leech to Adjacent
When this creature is deployed, Grant Bulls-Eye to all Friendly creatures.

When this creature dealing a critical hit, Inflict Magic Down for 2 turns and Blind.
Any enemy creature deployed while this creature is on the board gets 10% Poison and Slow for 1 Turn.
When any friendly creature kill any target creature, Inflict 7% Burn on enemy team.
